Potential presidential timber Donald Trump, who, by his own admission, is “the very definition of the American success story, “ came to Miami Monday on an exploratory mission to find out whether he is hugely popular or what. Today I want to tell you about an exciting innovation in television programming from the Czech Republic. By way of background, I should explain that the Czech Republic is a nation that very few Americans visit because they're not sure how to spell "Czech."
